message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm looking for $250 for it. Would you be interested in making a purchase?
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?
I understand you think it's a bit pricey, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $200. Would you be willing to go for that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to go as low as $175?
I'm not willing to go as low as $175, but I can see you're making a serious offer. I'm willing to compromise at $220. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with $220. Would you be willing to go as low as $190?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're running out of time, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can meet you at $210. Would you be willing to go there?
I understand the urgency, but I'm still not comfortable with $210. Would you be willing to go as low as $195?
I'm not willing to go as low as $195, but I'm willing to meet you at $205. This is my final offer, so please let me know if you're willing to accept it.
I'm sorry, but I've already gone as low as I can. I'm going to have to pass on this offer. I'll consider buying the product from John for $100 instead.
